imdb.plot outline: There is a first time for everything, and for everyone. This show explores the unconventional side of sex, the darker aspects and the underworld that surrounds them. All taboos must be left out, and only the open-minded audience will be able to enter this dark side. Through interviews and real-life situations we will get to know the people behind the masks on a daily basis and maybe even change our perception on some activities that might have been considered hardcore in the past.
imdb.title: Para todo hay una primera vez
akas: Para todo hay una primera vez (Mexico)
plot: There is a first time for everything, and for everyone. This show explores the unconventional side of sex, the darker aspects and the underworld that surrounds them. All taboos must be left out, and only the open-minded audience will be able to enter this dark side. Through interviews and real-life situations we will get to know the people behind the masks on a daily basis and maybe even change our perception on some activities that might have been considered hardcore in the past.::Btf

¿Pleasure or sin? Sex is the motor that has lead the human being to cross unimagined limits. Whether it is with reproductive intentions, as a business or even as a spiritual therapy, there are so many ways to practice it as ways to see life. This is the case of the thirteen characters on the exciting documentary series "There is a first time for everything", who show us a different approach on sex in each episode, where pleasure and eroticism lead them to self-discovery, but also to comprehend the other side, where stigmas fall when discovering their rituals and motivations, and where maybe, you will enjoy something that you had not in a long time: a first time.::Btf
